text: Songs for Daddy is a 2014 Jill Johnson studio album. The album is a tribute to her father's music taste. ==Track listing== #Crazy in Love #Hallelujah I Love Him So #Fly Me to the Moon #Moon River #Something's Gotta Give #That's Life #Love is Here to Stay #The Very thought of You #No other Daddy but You #After You've Gone #Everybody Loves Somebody #I Can't Give You Anything but Love ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2014) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2014) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) | 18 |} ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Jill Johnson albums
title: Songs for Daddy
